generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road surface with white lane markings, extending from the foreground to the background, including areas where vehicles and cyclists are present.
- sidewalk: A sidewalk is visible on the right side of the road, where cyclists are riding and pedestrians might walk, separated from the road by a curb and some poles.
- building: A large, light-colored building with a stone facade and glass windows is visible in the background, behind the road and sidewalk.
- vegetation: Several trees with green foliage are visible in the background, lining the road and surrounding the building.
- sky: A portion of the sky is visible above the trees and building, appearing partly cloudy.
- person: A person is visible on the right side of the image, riding a bicycle and wearing a helmet.
- rider: The person on the bicycle is a rider, as they are using a bicycle to move.
- car: A silver car is visible on the left side of the image, parked or driving on the road.
- traffic light: A traffic light is visible on a pole on the right side of the image, near the sidewalk.
- traffic sign: Several traffic signs are visible, including a red circle with a horizontal bar (no entry sign) and a blue circle with a downward arrow (mandatory direction sign), mounted on poles.
- pole: Multiple poles are visible in the image, including those supporting traffic signs and traffic lights.
- bicycle: A bicycle is visible on the right side of the image, being ridden by a person.
